title: 1916ish Red Sox Warming Up, Fenway Park Postcard
author: Andrew1975

posts.post_title: 1916ish Red Sox Warming Up, Fenway Park Postcard
posts.post_content:
Early Red Sox/Fenway postcard for sale. $SOLD net to me via PayPal and includes shipping in the US.

*Please note that despite what some online sellers have advertised recently, it is NOT Babe Ruth batting in the picture. I have seen examples of this postcard postmarked prior to Ruth’s arrival in Boston. Pretty cool image, nonetheless.

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20230110/86614ce00a86d3b5e61f88be4e158ceb.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20230110/506a08da6d618ef7f37988d37c598ec9.jpg[/IMG]
